#
# external/pywavelets
#

This code was extracted from the pywavelet package for use in APT.
The licence is the MIT License therefore no copyright conflicts
will arise through use of this code.  See COPYING.txt in this directory
for any copyright restrictions demanded by the author.

The URL from which this code was downloaded was http://pypi.python.org/pypi/PyWavelets/.

For the purpose of use in APT, it is expected that the numerical methods for wavelet transforms in this library are stable and need not follow any pywavelet package updates.
